attributes.action: Persuade Channel 4 to withdraw their photographs of Princess Diana from their forthcoming TV programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Channel 4 are proposing to show photographs of Princess Diana dying in the car following the crash in Paris in their forthcoming TV prgamme.
This is a blatant case of invasion of privacy and the fact that she is dead does not alter this fact.
Channel 4 is only interested in ratings and advertising revenue, and has no concern about the feelings of all those concerned.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
